LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceHeavy.label: heavy charge lance
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceHeavy.description: A heavy, pulse-charged rail-assisted lance weapon used by mechanoids. It fires three high-velocity rounds in quick succession as a burst, charged with unstable energy as each shot leaves the acceleration rail.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceHeavy.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.RM_Gun_ChargeLanceHeavy.tools.1.label: rail
